titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on certain sports footwear with cleats valued at $6.50/pair or more but not over $10/pair.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 5/9/2012--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on certain sports footwear with cleats valued at $6.50/pair or more but not over $10/pair.
